= Support =

== Looking for Support? ==

 - There is an IRC channel, #flourishlib on Freenode — accessible via any IRC
   client or a simple [http://webchat.freenode.net/?channels=#flourishlib web
   interface]
 - The [http://forum.flourishlib.com discussion forum] allows your questions to
   be seen by lots of people
 - If you’ve found a bug or want to request a feature, you can create an issue
   in the appropriate repository on GitHub:
   - https://github.com/flourishlib/flourish-classes/issues
   - https://github.com/flourishlib/flourish-tests/issues
   - https://github.com/flourishlib/flourish-docs/issues

If you are interested in custom development, consulting or paid support/help,
please feel free to [mailto:will@wbond.net email me].

== Want to Support Flourish? ==

Below are some useful ways that you can help encourage the growth of Flourish,
or just say “thanks.”

 - Help others in the [http://forum.flourishlib.com discussion forum]
 - [https://github.com/flourishlib Open issues or submit pull requests]
 - [https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_donations&business=will%40flourishlib%2ecom&item_name=Flourish&no_shipping=0&no_note=1&tax=0&currency_code=USD&lc=US&bn=PP%2dDonationsBF&charset=UTF%2d8 Donate money] via PayPal
 - [http://www.amazon.com/gp/registry/wishlist/2OLC10BQEZZMV/ref=wl_web Buy a
   gift] from Amazon
